p:
Infectious bronchitis virus (IBV) is currently classified in the species Avian coronavirus, genus Gammacoronavirus, family Coronaviridae ( https://talk.ictvonline.org/). The viral genome is about 27Kb long and encodes different non-structural, accessory and structural proteins. Among those, the structural spike protein is by far the most extensively studied, because of its role in viral attachment, cell tropism and immunity
1 . Additionally, the current IBV classification in genotypes and lineages is based on the phylogenetic analysis of the corresponding genome region
2 .
